statements: SELECT * FROM electronic_waste_collection_events;
SELECT event_name, location_name, event_date FROM electronic_waste_collection_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM electronic_waste_collection_events WHERE event_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location_name, location_address FROM electronic_waste_collection_events WHERE location_name ILIKE '%central%';
SELECT event_name, collected_items FROM electronic_waste_collection_events WHERE collected_items->>'item' = 'laptop';
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste_collection_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, location_name, count(collected_items) FROM electronic_waste_collection_events GROUP BY event_name, location_name;
SELECT event_id, event_name, location_name, location_address FROM electronic_waste_collection_events ORDER BY location_name DESC, event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, count(collected_items) AS total_items_collected FROM electronic_waste_collection_events GROUP BY event_name HAVING count(collected_items) > 10;
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste_collection_events WHERE event_name ILIKE '%recycle%';
SELECT * FROM e_waste_collection_events;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM e_waste_collection_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM e_waste_collection_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_location, event_description FROM e_waste_collection_events WHERE event_location = 'Community Center';
SELECT * FROM e_waste_collection_locations ORDER BY location_city DESC;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_collection_events WHERE event_location = 'City Hall';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM e_waste_collection_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM e_waste_collection_events WHERE event_location <> 'School';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM e_waste_collection_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM e_waste_collection_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%recycling%';
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_location='New York';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date='2023-01-01';
SELECT location_name, location_city FROM locations ORDER BY location_city DESC;

SELECT event_name, location_name FROM events JOIN event_locations ON events.event_id = event_locations.event_id JOIN locations ON event_locations.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE location_city='San Francisco';
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location_name FROM events INNER JOIN event_locations ON events.event_id = event_locations.event_id INNER JOIN locations ON event_locations.location_id = locations.location_id;

SELECT event_name, location_city, location_country FROM events INNER JOIN event_locations ON events.event_id = event_locations.event_id INNER JOIN locations ON event_locations.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE location_city = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM collection_events;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_location FROM collection_events WHERE event_type = 'Cleanup';
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_location FROM collection_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_participants WHERE participant_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_weight FROM waste_items WHERE item_weight > 20;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_location, event_type FROM collection_events;
SELECT * FROM event_participants WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM collection_locations WHERE location_contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM waste_items WHERE item_weight > 50;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM waste_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM collection_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM collection_events;
SELECT * FROM event_participants WHERE participation_status = 'Attending';
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM collection_locations WHERE location_capacity > 50;
SELECT item_name, item_weight, event_name FROM collected_items INNER JOIN collection_events ON collected_items.event_id = collection_events.event_id;
SELECT * FROM collection_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM collection_events ORDER BY event_name ASC
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_description FROM collection_events WHERE event_location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT c.event_name, COUNT(i.item_id) AS total_items FROM collection_events c JOIN collected_items i ON c.event_id = i.event_id GROUP BY c.event_name
SELECT p.participant_name, e.event_name, e.event_date, p.participation_status FROM event_participants p JOIN collection_events e ON p.event_id = e.event_id WHERE p.participation_status = 'Attending'
